name: Pop Top Adventure
description:
PEP POP is talking to his friends who are preparing for the festival that will take place in the small village POP TOP, and suddenly the village is invaded by soldiers of ZOIN the Red King and the festival trophies are stolen.

PEP POP won't give up until he recovers the trophies, and he'll need your help!

With each level to find the trophies, PEP POP will defeat enemies, overcome obstacles, collecting coins, treasures, and emeralds...

Features

  • 50 levels to play: explore 50 levels collecting coins, jumping between
    platforms and defeating enemies.

  • Accessories: use the accessories available in the level.

  • Bosses to Defeat: face 5 main bosses.

  • Extra challenge: In each level, collect an emerald as an extra challenge.

  • Colorful Pixel Art Graphics: unique pixel art style graphics.

  • Original music: unique soundtrack to pack the adventure.

  • For the whole family: can be played by adults and children, easy learning, simple controls.

  • Moderate challenge: some levels can be a big challenge, but it is always possible to overcome them with some dedication.


Use the accessories available in the level



The extra challenge is to find and collect the emerald hidden in each level..
